hero.text1: We develop autonomous drones and smart infrastructure for logistics, surveillance, and education.
hero.text2: From design and manufacturing to autonomous operation, we cover the entire tech chain.
hero.text3: Decision-making and intelligent flight in complex environments. Our engineering flies on its own.

footer.description: Air Hive is a Mexican startup developing autonomous drones, smart stations, and solutions for logistics, security, and education.
footer.tagline: Automation, AI agents, and drones for real operations.

home.autonomy_text: We design drones capable of carrying out specific tasks autonomously. We integrate hardware, software, and computer vision so they operate without manual control.
home.innovation_text: We build aerial solutions from Mexico to solve real problems across industries. High-level engineering, developed locally.
home.education_text: We foster education in science and technology through hands-on drone experiences. We bring students closer to the world of robotics, programming, and engineering.

home_redesign.hero_text: We build end-to-end automation systems for teams that need speed, precision, and control. We integrate AI agents, operational analytics, and autonomous aerial platforms.
home_redesign.hero_panel_text: We turn operational challenges into measurable automated systems.
home_redesign.stack_title: Every layer is designed to execute, learn, and improve.
home_redesign.stack_text: We combine hardware, software, and AI models to automate logistics, monitoring, and mission-critical workflows.
home_redesign.card_1_text: We map your workflow and design autonomous flows to reduce time, errors, and cost.
home_redesign.card_2_text: We train assistants and agents that analyze real-time data and recommend actions.
home_redesign.card_3_text: We build and integrate drones for inspection, security, and field data capture.
home_redesign.final_title: Start with a free diagnostic and a clear implementation roadmap.
home_redesign.final_text: You get an actionable automation plan with technical priorities, impact estimate, and practical milestones.
home_redesign.hero_headline: Automation, AI agents, and drones to improve your operation.
home_redesign.hero_subheadline: We detect bottlenecks and savings opportunities. You get a phased plan with clear priorities.
home_redesign.what_we_do_title: Four focused levers to improve your operation without unnecessary complexity.
home_redesign.what_we_do_1_text: Less rework, fewer errors, more control.
home_redesign.what_we_do_2_text: Automated follow-up and tasks without losing consistency.
home_redesign.what_we_do_3_text: Reports and alerts without manual work.
home_redesign.diagnostic_title: We analyze your operation and show where to start.
home_redesign.diagnostic_subtitle: We identify friction, available data, and priorities to automate with real impact.
home_redesign.review_1_text: Real mapping of steps, owners, and handoffs.
home_redesign.review_2_text: What exists and what can be connected quickly.
home_redesign.workflow_title: Diagnostic → Solution design → Implementation → Measurement and improvement
home_redesign.workflow_1_text: We capture context, current process, and critical friction points.
home_redesign.workflow_2_text: We define architecture, scope, and prioritized quick wins.
home_redesign.workflow_3_text: We execute by phases with minimal operational disruption.
home_redesign.workflow_4_text: We track KPIs and refine continuously to scale outcomes.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Educational and custom drones for an autonomous future.
products.kit_description: Designed for educational centers, this kit allows students to assemble a drone from scratch, understand how it works, and program it for autonomous missions. Includes exclusive training and tutorials from our team.
products.kit_feature2: Includes GPS, IMU, ESCs, flight controller, frame, propellers and more
products.kit_feature3: Ideal for workshops, engineering courses and educational competitions
products.kit_feature4: Affordable price and direct support from Air Hive
products.custom_description: We build custom drones tailored to our clients' needs: from FPV stunt drones to professional platforms for aerial photography or fully autonomous missions.
products.custom_feature2: High-quality components selected for their use case
products.custom_feature3: Integration of cameras, GPS, LiDAR, and more

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Do you have a question, an idea, or are you interested in collaborating with us? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

videos.title: Captured with Hive I
videos.description: Aerial power and precision within reach of your mission.

videos.title: Explore without limits
videos.description: Capture every corner with autonomy and stability.

videos.title: Technology to tell stories
videos.description: A new way to see the world from the sky.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We help you harness the power of drones.

training.title: Learn to fly with safety and confidence
training.short: Hands-on courses to learn how to fly drones.
training.full: We offer hands-on courses to help you learn how to fly drones for recreational or professional use. Gain essential skills and knowledge to fly safely and prevent crashes.

land.title: See your property like never before
land.short: Aerial images and 3D animations for your project.
land.full: We capture high-resolution aerial images and generate 3D animations showing measurements, boundaries, and visual walkthroughs. Ideal for promotion, architecture, land sales, or real estate projects.

events.title: Professional aerial footage for unforgettable moments
events.short: Aerial filming for events of all kinds.
events.full: We capture aerial footage using the right type of drone for each event. Whether it's a social celebration, corporate activity, or sports event, we provide unique perspectives to preserve your most meaningful moments.

batteries.title: Specialized maintenance for smart batteries
batteries.short: Repair and cell balancing for DJI and custom batteries.
batteries.full: We inspect and repair damaged DJI batteries, including cell balancing and diagnosis of common issues. We also work with custom Li-Ion and Li-Po batteries.

registration.title: Stay compliant and fly with peace of mind
registration.short: Official drone registration support in Mexico.
registration.full: We assist in registering your drones with Mexico’s Federal Civil Aviation Agency (AFAC), ensuring your operations follow current regulations.

support.title: Practical solutions for real-world challenges
support.short: Tailored technical support for your drone needs.
support.full: We provide technical guidance on equipment selection, system integration, and problem-solving in drone-related projects. Our support is tailored to each project's specific needs.

services_redesign.cta_text: Book a free diagnostic to define which workflows can be improved with AI, automation, and drones.
services_redesign.card_1_text: We design workflows to reduce rework, errors, and idle time in operations.
services_redesign.card_2_title: AI agents for sales and operations
services_redesign.card_2_text: We implement assistants that follow up, prioritize tasks, and maintain consistency.
services_redesign.card_3_text: We connect systems and build automated reports for faster decisions.
services_redesign.card_4_text: We capture field evidence and convert it into actionable data for your team.
services_redesign.workflow_title: A clear method to implement and scale results
services_redesign.workflow_1_text: We understand context, current process, and critical friction points.
services_redesign.workflow_2_text: We define architecture, scope, and high-impact quick wins.
services_redesign.workflow_3_text: We execute in phases without slowing operations.
services_redesign.workflow_4_text: We track KPIs and continuously optimize.

contact_redesign.title: Activate your free diagnostic
contact_redesign.subtitle: Tell us about your operation and we will propose a practical roadmap to implement automation, AI agents, and drones.
contact_redesign.focus_text: Process automation, AI agents, and drone deployment.
contact_redesign.goal_placeholder: e.g. reduce inspection time or automate reporting

about.story_title: Our story begins in the sky
about.story_text: Air Hive was founded in 2025 with a mission to democratize access to aerial autonomy. We believe drones can be transformative tools that empower industries, communities, and technological progress in the world.
about.mission_text: To develop intelligent aerial solutions that enhance safety, efficiency, and education through accessible design and cutting-edge technology.
about.vision_text: To become the leading aerial innovation company in Latin America, bringing autonomy and technology where they’re needed most.
about.team_text_1: Air Hive is built by people passionate about technology, education, and positive impact. Our team combines expertise in engineering, innovation, and entrepreneurship to create solutions that truly take flight.
about.team_text_2: We’re driven by the belief that Mexican talent can lead the new era of aerial autonomy.
about.philosophy_text: We believe in a future where drones don’t just fly—they solve real problems: from protecting communities to inspiring the next generation of engineers.

diagnostic_page.title: We analyze your operation and show where to start.
diagnostic_page.subtitle: We identify friction, available data, and priorities to automate with real impact.
diagnostic_page.for_1: Teams dealing with operational rework and fragmented processes.
diagnostic_page.for_2: Companies with scattered data and low traceability.
diagnostic_page.for_3: Sales or operations areas still running manual follow-up.
diagnostic_page.for_4: Operations that want automation without slowing the team down.
diagnostic_page.step_3: Impact vs effort prioritization + quick wins.
diagnostic_page.step_4: Phased roadmap and ready next steps.
diagnostic_page.faq_1_a: No. It is completely free and with no commercial commitment.
diagnostic_page.faq_2_a: The initial session takes 15-20 minutes. The deliverable is sent within 48 hours.
diagnostic_page.faq_3_q: Do we need everything documented first?
diagnostic_page.faq_3_a: No. We work with what you already have and structure what is needed.
diagnostic_page.faq_4_q: Can you implement after the diagnostic?
diagnostic_page.faq_4_a: Yes. If we move forward, we execute by phases based on priority and team capacity.
diagnostic_page.form_subtitle: Share your context and we will contact you with the recommended next action.
diagnostic_page.form_placeholder: Briefly describe your operation and main challenge.
